alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 4:12AM PST until February 25 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with localized areas of 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Wave heights on Pyramid Lake of 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Northern Washoe County, Surprise Valley California and Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 10 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After periods of snow showers today and tonight, snow will become steady in nature by daybreak Friday.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
